name: lucaskitchen-VirtualBaker
0:
”Alexa open Virtual Baker”
”Alexa ask Virtual Baker to help me with the ingredients for my bread”
”Alexa ask Virtual Baker to help me with the steps to make my bread”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual baker
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill will help you measure the ingredientes for your sourdough bread, can tell you the meaning of sourdough baking terms and will also create reminders to guide you throughout the bread-making process, from the kneeding to baking
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
